transArray.content: I stay here every time I have a meeting, the surroundings are convenient and fast. The staff's service attitude is good and the room is clean and tidy. The air conditioning worked well and the breakfast was pretty good. I will stay here again in the future. Worth a thumbs up.

Thank you very much for your stay and sharing, and also thank you for your high recognition of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The smile on your lips is our greatest appreciation. We will continue to work hard to provide you with a more comfortable and convenient stay. Environment, all the hotel staff look forward to your every visit and wish you all the best! General Manager: Li Changxia
